plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code. Software engineering, creative writing, business operations, and more through specialized autonomous agent teams featuring 46 agents (3 core + 43 software), Intelligence Layer for proactive issue detection, QA Layer with 9 review agents, Executive Leadership (CEO, CTO, CFO, COO, VP Engineering), and comprehensive workflow orchestration
